plex_observation.title: THE STRUCTURAL SUPPRESSION OF HALLUCINATION
plex_observation.summary: The Squad topology acts as a real-time adversarial filter. Four different training sets rarely share the same hallucination vector. Consensus filters noise.
mechanism: DIVERSITY: Four architectures with different training sets
ROLES: Assigned constraints force evaluative mode over generative mode
EXTERNAL_MEMORY: Truth is in the JSON artifacts, not in weights
plex_observation.conclusion: We didn't fix the models. We fixed the topology.

Consensus across diverse architectures suppresses hallucination
